body.name: Queen Size Bed Frame Industrial Platform Bed with Charging Station, 2-Tier Storage Headboard/No Box Spring Needed/Noise-Free/Dark Brown
features: Storage Headboard with Charging Station: Built in 2 Standard Plug Outlets & 2 USB Ports with 6.5ft long power supply cord, this spacious 2-tier storage headboard equals to nightstands, charge your phone, pad and store odds and ends
Sturdy Metal Frame: Made of selected iron slats and strong legs, this bed frame can easily bear up to 900lbs. With rubber strip on each slat to eliminate noise and keep the mattress no-slide
Modern Industrial Style: Retro wooden headboard & footboard mixed with black metal add chic to any room style. Metal slats are all coated with anti-rust powder to prolong service life
Under-Bed Storage: There's 12 inch of under-bed clearance, providing extra large space to store boxes, shoes or so on and easily cleaned up by a sweeping robot
Easy to Assemble: Featured with snap-fit design, two people can assemble this platform bed within 30 mins. Recommend mattress: 12"-15"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy bedframe, nice looking, and well designed, with power sockets on headboard. Was easy to assemble especially with the power tool I had (strongly recommend having a power tool given the number of screws/nuts & bolts you have to secure). This is a great purchase for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy installation & nice quality
reviews.reviewText: Bed frame was delivered quickly. I was able to put it together by myself with only the tools provided in the packaging. It even came with extra screws. The metal frame is nice and sturdy- box spring is not needed, the mattress will be just fine on it alone. The outlets are nice, especially with the 2 usb spots. My son doesn’t need night stands anymore since this has plug-ins and the headboard is wide enough to hold his tablet, phone, books, etc. I would definitely Recommend this bed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great functionality and good design
reviews.reviewText: Frame took my husband 3 hours to put together by himself. The directions were straightforward…just a lot of screws and parts to keep organized while assembling. We got the grey tone, but it isn’t really grey, more weathered brown. The color was a little disappointing bc got it to match current dresser. Overall the bed is comfortable and has great functionality. I love the built in shelves. The mattress sits slightly lower than sides, so it doesn’t slide which is a huge plus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bargain and well-built
reviews.reviewText: I can’t believe the value of this bed. I am a heavier guy and needed a bed that won’t break on me. This bed is solid and perhaps the only drawback is the sheet number of parts required for assembly. Bed is solid, looks good, and doesn’t scoot across the floor. Would recommend to anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bed for the price
reviews.reviewText: Love the look of this bed in our spare room. Love the headboard with the shelf because it also has outlet and USB plugs. Saves space in the room because no nightstands are needed. Great price and not hard to put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Got this for our new pillow cube mattress. Works amazing! We love the modern wood look and the charging station built into the headboard is great! Has lots of room for storage underneath and doesn’t need a box spring. Foam around the feet stop you from stubbing your toes on the supports. Loved this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was easy to assemble and looks great in our bedroom!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I put this together myself (59 yr old female) & after a few errors that made me backtrack, It took about 1 1/2 hrs. The instructions are pictures only, but it still wasn't that difficult. Remember to not tighten the screws on the slats until screws on both sides are started...the slat can then be adjusted to meet up with the hole. It's ingenius how they did that! You get an extra screw for each size, all the tools needed, and, AND, every single screw hole lined up properly. Every one...the whole time I was putting it together, I was thinking, no way! Then I'd come across one that seemed like it didn't line up--but slight adjustments for angles and yep! I was so impressed. It comes packaged very well with all parts clearly marked. Way higher quality than I was expecting given the great price!The slight edge at the bottom holds the mattress in place, but it does slide a bit from side to side, and the end corners are easy to run in to, so if kids are around, be careful, and don't hit your shin.Well worth the price, and I'm glad to see some companies still care about quality, and making sure the darn screw holes line up!!
